summary: a mod to improve the available lighting in the basement of the the hearthfire Lakeview Manor House this in turn allows the removal of all ambient light for a more realistic feel.
descriptionHtml:
My first attempt at a MOD for any game.

i have decided I like the look of ELFX and the way it reduced ambient light to produce more realistic environments. I however noted that this change wasn't reflected within the Lakeview Manor House in hearthfire. I therefore took it upon myself to rearrange the lighting to give a more realistic feel.

However with the complexity of the main Lake view house I decided it would be better if for my first MOD I started with a smaller challenge. Therefore I have started by remodelling the lighting in the basement for the Lakeview Manor House.

As this is my first attempt at a mod I cannot confirm its compatibility with any other Mods to the Lakeview Property or elsewhere. But I have run it with my current selection of mods without any problems.

Again as this is my first MOD my apologies but I will unlikely be able to help anyone with any compatibility issues or queries, but I would appreciate any questions and/or feedback the community has to offer on my first attempt
author: Stevros
